Notes

Comes with an obi (printed in Germany) and a black and white insert. Obi has album title spelled as "Scenary." Recorded September 7, 1976 at YAMAHA Hall, Sapporo. ℗ 2017 Manufactured and distributed by Ultra-Vybe. Inc, Tokyo, Japan. Jasrac [logo] R-1730589 2018 repress has Variant 2 runout etchings.
